alert.description: Configuration of alerts that monitor component resources

DimensionSource.description: The source of the alert dimensions - resource lookup or explicit configuration

SettingEnvName.description: A setting name as env that will provide the dimension value

Value.description: The value of the dimension to match

Resource.description: Provide a component resource to determine the dimensions of the metric

antivirus.description: Standard Configuration options to define antivirus configuration

autoscalegroup.description: Control how a virtual machine based autoscaling group behaves

AlwaysReplaceOnUpdate.description: Replace instances on every update action

DetailedMetrics.description: Enable the collection of autoscale group detailed metrics

MinSuccessInstances.description: The minimum percantage of instances that must sucessfully update

MinUpdateInstances.description: The minimum number of instances which must be available during an update

ReplaceCluster.description: When set to true a brand new cluster will be built, if false the instances in the current cluster will be replaced

StartupTimeout.description: How long to wait for a cfn-signal to be received from a host

UpdatePauseTime.description: How long to pause betweeen updates of instances

aws_computeimage.description: AWS Specific overrides to source compute images

Source.description: Where to source the image id from - Reference: uses the Regions AMIs reference property to find the image

OS.description: The OS Image family defined in the Region AMI

Type.description: The image Type defined under the family in the Region AMI

aws:Source:AMI.description: Use an explicit AMI for the image

aws:Source:SSMParam.description: Lookup the image Id using the SSM ParameterStore

Name.description: The name of the parameter to lookup

aws_ecs_computeimage.description: AWS ECS Specific overrides to source compute images

Source.description: Where to source the image id from - Reference: uses the Regions AMIs reference property to find the image

OS.description: The OS Image family defined in the Region AMI

Type.description: The image Type defined under the family in the Region AMI

aws:Source:AMI.description: Use an explicit AMI for the image

aws_operatingsystem.description: Standard Configuration options to define an operating system

Distribution.description: The distribution of the operating system

Family.description: The broad family of operating system

MajorVersion.description: The major version of the distribution

MinorVersion.description: The minor version of the distribution major version

aws_s3_notification.description: AWS S3 specific configuration options for notifications

aws:QueuePermissionMigration.description: Deprecation alert: set to true once policy updated for queue

aws:TopicPermissionMigration.description: Deprecation alert: set to true once policy updated for topic

backupwindow.description: Standard Configuration options to define a backup window

BasePath.description: The base path at the origin destination

ConnectionTimeout.description: How long to wait until a response is received from the origin

OriginLink.description: A link to the origin that requests will route to

RequestForwarding.description: Controls how the request is forwarded to the origin

AdditionalHeaders.description: Headers to add when forwarding the request to the origin

Name.description: The name of the header ( object id used if not provided)

Policy.description: How the request forwarding policy is determined - LinkType = Use a predefined policy for the link type, custom = your own

Cookies.description: A list of cookie names to forward to the origin ( _all - all cookies )

Headers.description: A list of header keys to forward to the origin ( _all - all headers, _cdn - CDN included headers )

Methods.description: The HTTP Methods that will be forwarded to the origin

QueryParams.description: A list of query parameter names to forward ( _all - all parameters )

TLSProtocols.description: When using a TLS backend the protocols the CDN will use as a client

cdnttl.description: Configuration for the cache TTL of a CDN

Default.description: The default cache time when the origin has not specified a time - seconds

Maximum.description: The maximum time that an origin can specify to cache content - seconds

Minimum.description: The minimum time that an origin can specify to cache content - seconds

certificate.description: Controls the full CN used for a certificate along with how the certificate should be generated

Domain.description: Explicit domain id which will override the product domain

computeimage.description: Configuration for the source of compute instance images

Source.description: Where to source the image id from - Reference: uses the Regions AMIs reference property to find the image

OS.description: The OS Image family defined in the Region AMI

Type.description: The image Type defined under the family in the Region AMI

container.description: Descirbes each container that will be used as part of a service or task

Cpu.description: The CPU share to assign to the container

Extensions.description: Extensions to invoke as part of component processing

Gpu.description: The number of physical GPUs to assign to the container

Image.description: Set the source of the components image

InitProcess.description: Enable a docker based init process to manage processes

MaximumMemory.description: Set to 0 to not set a maximum

RunMode.description: A per container setting which can be used by the app to determine run mode for a container in a task - defaults to the second half of a dash separated id

Ulimits.description: Linux OS based limits for the container

HardLimit.description: The OS level hard limit to apply

Name.description: The name of the ulimit to apply

SoftLimit.description: The User level limit to apply

Version.description: Override the version from the deployment unit

containerhost.description: Describes the configuration required for a container host

ComputeInstance.description: Configuration of compute instances used in the component

ComputeTasks.description: Customisation to setup the compute instance from its image

Extensions.description: A list of extensions to source boostrap tasks from

UserTasksRequired.description: A list of compute task types which must be accounted for in extensions on top of the component tasks

Image.description: Configures the source of the virtual machine image used for the instance

ManagementPorts.description: The network ports used for remote management of the instance

OperatingSystem.description: The operating system details of the compute instance

Extensions.description: Extensions to invoke as part of component processing

MultiAZ.description: Deploy resources to multiple Availablity Zones

Bootstrap.description: A profile to include additional bootstrap sources as part of the instance startup

LogFile.description: Defines the logfile profile which sets the log files to collect from the compute instance

Logging.description: profile to define where logs are forwarded to from this component

containerservice.description: Describes the configuration required for a container service

Engine.description: The engine used to run the container

MultiAZ.description: Deploy resources to multiple Availablity Zones

Additional.description: Providers who will meet the additional compute capacity outside of the default

Weight.description: The ratio of containers allocated to the provider based on the configured providers

Provider.description: The default container compute provider - _engine uses the default provider of the engine

RequiredCount.description: The minimum count of containers to run on the default provider

Weight.description: The ratio of containers allocated to the provider based on the configured providers

DistinctInstance.description: Each task is running on a different container instance when true

Strategy.description: How to place containers on the cluster

containertask.description: Describes the configuration required for a container task

Engine.description: The engine used to run the container

MultiAZ.description: Deploy resources to multiple Availablity Zones

Provider.description: The default container compute provider - _engine uses the default provider of the engine

TaskCount.description: The number of tasks to run on the schedule

contextpath.description: Combined with the getContextPath() function creates a name or path based on your current context

Custom.description: The custom string to include if custom is included in the path

ProviderId.description: The Provider Id for the account

Style.description: Provide the value as a single string or a file system style path

contextpath_fullpath.description: Creates a Segment unique context path by default

Custom.description: The custom string to include if custom is included in the path

ProviderId.description: The Provider Id for the account

Style.description: Provide the value as a single string or a file system style path

core_profile.description: Internal: desribes the base profiles for all components

Baseline.description: The profile used to lookup standard services provided by the segment baseline

Deployment.description: A list of deployment profiles to apply to this component

Placement.description: The resource group assignment placement for resources in the component

Policy.description: A list of enforced deployment profiles which override component configuraiton

Testing.description: The testing profiles to apply to the component

dbsysevent.description: Configuration of reported system notifications from component resources

Categories.description: Optional array of event categories to report

InstanceOrder.description: Layers whose configuration data should be included in the solution for an instance of the district

NamePartOrder.description: Parts to be included in the name of an instance of the district. If not provided, the InstanceOrder is assumed. If not a defined name part, the part is assumed to be a layer.

Ignore.description: An array of values to not include if encountered

domainname.description: The base domain and contextual information to include in domain names

Domain.description: Explicit domain id which will override the product domain

ecs_computeimage.description: ECS Specific overrides to source compute images

Source.description: Where to source the image id from - Reference: uses the Regions AMIs reference property to find the image

OS.description: The OS Image family defined in the Region AMI

Type.description: The image Type defined under the family in the Region AMI

environmentformat.description: How to format environment variables from settings

FileFormat.description: The format of the file when using AsFile

hostname.description: Control the information include in the host part of a Fully qualified domain name

image.description: Controls where a code image is sourced from for an application component

Source.description: The type of source to use for the image

image_container.description: An image source to get a container image

Source.description: The type of source to use for the image

Source:ContainerRegistry.description: A docker container registry to source the image from

Image.description: The docker image that you want to use

image_url.description: An image that supports pulling the image from a URL and supports disabling pulling an image

ImageHash.description: The expected sha1 hash of the Url if empty any will be accepted

Url.description: The Url to the openapi file

Source.description: The type of source to use for the image

ImageHash.description: The expected sha1 hash of the Url if empty any will be accepted

Url.description: The Url to the openapi file

source:extension.description: Use an inline extension to set the content of the function

CommentCharacters.description: The single line comment sequence for your language

IncludeRunId.description: Adds the RunId as a comment to ensure that it is unique

image_url_extension_archive.description: An image that supports pulling the image from a URL and from an extension and defining the Archive Format

ArchiveFormat.description: The archive format of the image to use

Source.description: The type of source to use for the image

source:extension.description: Use an inline extension to set the content of the function

CommentCharacters.description: The single line comment sequence for your language

image_url_none.description: An image that supports pulling the image from a URL

lbattach.description: Attaches a components port to a load balancer

ActiveRequired.description: Require that the linked occurrence has been deployed and is active

Direction.description: The direction the role applies to between the components

IncludeInContext.description: Include the attributes provided by this link in the environment context

Role.description: The role of the relationship between the components

logmetric.description: Generates a monitoring metric whenever the filter is matched in a log message

LogFilter.description: A filter expression to apply to logs that will trigger a metric bump

logwatcher.description: Configuration for services which can act on log subscriptions

Links.description: Links to the components with logs to watch

LogFilter.description: A filter expression to apply to logs that will be sent to the watcher

maintenancewindow.description: Standard Configuration options to define a maintenance window

module.description: Defines the CMDB modules to load

Enabled.description: To enable loading the module in this profile

Name.description: The name of the scneario to load

Parameters.description: The parameter values to provide to the module

Provider.description: The provider name which offers the module

Description.description: A description that will be applied to the rule

IPAddressGroups.description: A list of IP Address groups ids from the IPAddressGroups reference

Ports.description: A list of port ids from the Ports reference

SecurityGroups.description: A list of security groups or ids - for internal use only

objectstore_notification.description: Event notification for object changes in an object store

operatingsystem.description: Standard Configuration options to define an operating system

Distribution.description: The distribution of the operating system

Family.description: The broad family of operating system

MajorVersion.description: The major version of the distribution

MinorVersion.description: The minor version of the distribution major version

Schedule.description: UTC based cron schedule to apply updates

placementprofile.description: Manages where resource groups in a component are placed

DeploymentFramework.description: The deployment framework to use to generate the outputs for deployment

Provider.description: The provider to use to host the component

Region.description: The id of the region to host the component

plugin.description: Defines a CMDB plugin and how its loaded

Name.description: The id of the plugin to install

Priority.description: The priority order to load plugins - lowest first

Required.description: Ensure the plugin loads at all times

Source.description: Where the plugin for the plugin can be found

Path.description: a path within in the repository where the plugin starts

Ref.description: The ref to clone from the repo

Url.description: The Url for the git repository

scalingpolicy.description: Defines the behaviour of auto scaling resources

Cooldown.description: Cooldown time ( seconds ) after a scaling event has occurred before another event can be triggered

Adjustments.description: The adjustments to apply at each step

AdjustmentValue.description: The value to apply when the adjustment step is triggered

LowerBound.description: The lower bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the metric

UpperBound.description: The upper bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the metric

CapacityAdjustment.description: How to scale when the policy is triggered

MetricAggregation.description: The method used to agregate the cloudwatch metric

MinAdjustment.description: When minimum scale adjustment value to apply when triggered

RecommendedMetric.description: Use a recommended (predefined) metric for scaling

TrackingResource.description: The resource metric used to trigger scaling

scalingpolicy_ecs.description: ECS Specific overrides for scaling policies

ManageTermination.description: Alow the computer provider to manage when instances will be terminated

MaxAdjustment.description: The maximum instances to  update during scaling activities

MinAdjustment.description: The minimum instances to update during scaling activities

TargetCapacity.description: The target usage of the autoscale group to maintain as a percentage

Cooldown.description: Cooldown time ( seconds ) after a scaling event has occurred before another event can be triggered

Adjustments.description: The adjustments to apply at each step

AdjustmentValue.description: The value to apply when the adjustment step is triggered

LowerBound.description: The lower bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the metric

UpperBound.description: The upper bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the metric

CapacityAdjustment.description: How to scale when the policy is triggered

MetricAggregation.description: The method used to agregate the cloudwatch metric

MinAdjustment.description: When minimum scale adjustment value to apply when triggered

RecommendedMetric.description: Use a recommended (predefined) metric for scaling

TrackingResource.description: The resource metric used to trigger scaling

secretsource.description: Control how a secret is sourced

secretstring.description: Defines the policy for generating secret strings

RequireAllIncludedTypes.description: Require at least one of each included type

srvregattach.description: Attachs a component port to a service registry

table_hosting.description: Hosting and capacity configuration for global db tables

Enabled.description: Enables point in time recovery on the table

Billing.description: The billing mode for the table

Read.description: When using provisioned billing the maximum RCU of the table

Write.description: When using provisioned billing the maximum WCU of the table

Enabled.description: Enables event change streams for the table

volume.description: Defines the standard configuration of a storage volume

Device.description: The deivce Id of the volume where the disk will be attached

Iops.description: For volume types which support provisioned IOPS, this sets the requested IOPS

MountPath.description: An OS path where the disk will be mounted

Size.description: The size in GB of the volume

Type.description: The type of volume to provision - see provider for available types

waf.description: The Web Application Firewall Policy to apply

Logging.description: Logging profile to process WAF Logs that are stored in the OpsData DataBucket.
